thread.title: Ken Trenbirth

author: Ken Trenbirth
title: Ken Trenbirth
text:
I bought a personalised reg number, and used the one shop for all option to ha my private number plate made.
I ordered a plain number plate as I only wanted the Registration number printed on the plate.
When the plate arrived, it had also printed on it, who had made the plate and their telephone number.
So not plain. When I questioned this, i received an email to say this was a legal requirement.
When I checked the government website, I couldn't see where it said that it was a legal requirement for this company to advertise themselves on my business cars' number plate.
I've asked them to show me where this detail is and two days later I've had no response.
I think someone's nose is growing somewhere, bunch of bull sh
